import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { addFilter, addGender, addproduct, clearAll, fillFilter, removeFilter, removeGender, } from "../Redux/productRedux"; import "./CSS/Sidepanel.css"; const Sidepanel = () => { const mystyle = { //styling fontWeight: 600, }; const dispatch = useDispatch(); const productArray = useSelector(state => state.productFilter.products) const filtersArray = useSelector(state => state.productFilter.filters); useEffect(() => { const checkbox = document.querySelectorAll(".filter-checkbox"); for (let check of checkbox) { check.addEventListener("click", function (e) { const brand = e.target.value; if (e.target.checked === true) { dispatch(addFilter({ brand })); } else { dispatch(removeFilter({ brand })); } }); } const radio = document.querySelectorAll(".filter-radiobtn"); for (let btn of radio) { btn.addEventListener("click", function (e) { if(e.target.checked){ dispatch(clearAll({})) const gender = e.target.value dispatch(addGender({ gender })) productArray.filter((item) => item.category === e.target.value).map(item => { dispatch(addFilter({...item})) }) } }); } }); let brandFilters = filtersArray.map((item) => { return(
) }) function clear(){ dispatch(clearAll({})) dispatch(fillFilter({})) } return (
FILTERS
{/*styling*/}
BRAND
{brandFilters} {/*
*/}
); }; export default Sidepanel;
